title: PCB still hopeful of India-Pakistan in December
text: Construction crews continue to make progress on the South Valley Connector and are still on track to have the entire project completed by mid-December. Recent related news Najam Sethi, who heads the PCB's executive committee, also downplayed reports that the BCCI had not followed the norms of hospitality while inviting the Pakistan... Firstpost 3 hours ago - India A senior PCB official has said that there is still hope for the India-Pakistan bilateral cricket series to be held in December in the UAE DNA 3 hours ago - Sports PCB official has said that there is still hope for the India-Pakistan bilateral cricket series.
